reviews.review: (Potential Spoilers)At one point in the shitty story of Bioshock Infinate, when Booker and Elizabeth are riding a gunship to Comstocks zeplin, Booker utters the phrase "Why don't we just fly this thing to paris?". Great fucking idea Booker. Why didn't you? Apparently Booker wanted to live the high life and choose the First Lady Airship instead, a hard to get, behind-closed-doors airship. It just shows that Bioshock Infinate has a weak storyline disguised as something great. And it fooled lots of people to. 50,000 people. I dont have time to explain this games bullshit. Just read one of the other hundred negative reviews that are getting rapidly downvoted by Bioshock Infinate fanboys.

The best game I have ever played. You need to buy this game, it's interesting, action-packed, and makes you think. The atmosphere and setting are breathtaking and what truly make this game unique. I couldn't reccommend this game and it's dlc enough (except Clash in the Clouds, don't buy that).
If Walker Texas Ranger and Doctor Who had a baby and that baby grew up under Jim Crow, you would have this game.    10/10  because this game is, has been, and will be awesome!

Ive played many games: Wolfenstien, COD, Fallout, Half-Life, Assassins creed, etc. but none of them beat this game! this game so far is my favorite and tops them all! the othe bioshock games were great but nothing like this! the burial at sea dlc links the first game and infinite together in such a great way so my advice is that you get that along with the game. Best game!

Я буду скучать Элизабет!
Вот и прошел целый год с тех пор как я купил и прошел Bioshock Infinite. И вот, наконец-то я решился и потратил деньги на сизон пасс. И после прохождения "Burial at Sea" я могу сказать одно! Кен Левайн и студия  Irrational Games создали прекрасное произведение, тонко играющее с мировоззрением игрока и конечно же на нотах его души. Ведь Bioshock это - не просто тупой шутер с миловидной спутницей. Нет! Это хорошая, грустная и очень печальная история, имеющая как начало так и свой логический конец. И если в основном сюжете нам рассказали историю наемника, то в ДЛС же разработчики решили закрыть эту историю окончательно вылив на игрока столько всего что порой голова начинала болеть от только что увиденного. А мозг пытался покинуть черепную коробку. Определенно лучшая игра за последние пару лет. 12 грустных Элизабет из 10!
loco

Um dos melhores fps que já joguei, mas já aviso, se vc é daqueles que pula a historia dos jogos, que não liga para ela, melhor pular esse jogo, pois o foco dele é o enredo.
 
 O jogo tem uma das melhores historias que ja vi em qualquer tipo de midia, e não só isso, mas graças a IA excelente da elizabeth, sua companion ao longo do jogo, e a ótima construção da personagem, vc realmente acaba se importando com ela, vc se liga a personagem, e isso faz o enredo mais brilhante ainda. Os visuais, os cenarios! São lindos! A quantidade de detalhes é absurda, o jogo é "vivo", pessoas conversando, trabalhando, interagindo, é incrivel.

 Um ponto negativo para alguns é que o gameplay não é tão interessante, na verdade é meio enjoativo e simples. Não é ruim, longe disso, mas tambem não é nada excepcional. E as 2 dlc da história, burial at sea episodio 1 e 2, eu pessoalmente não gostei muito do segundo episodio, do gameplay dele, mas isso se deve a eu não gostar muito de games stealth, e esse segundo episodio muda o gameplay para focar bastante nisso. Porem de novo é no enredo que as dlc brilham.

 Bioshock infinite é sem duvidas um dos melhores jogos por ai para quem gosta de enredo, já para quem gosta de shooters frenéticos e não liga para historia provavelmente vai achar o jogo meio "boring".

Vamos lá. Por onde começar? Talvez em 2013. Quando o jogo começou a ganhar mais atenção (apesar de seus vários atrasos no lançamento), eu não ia muito com a cara dele não. Já conhecia os dois jogos anteriores da trilogia e já era um grande fã, olhei torto pra Infinite por que era uma mudança bem radical. Quer dizer, um jogo de ação? Uma cidade no ar? Onde estava Rapture? Onde estavam os big daddies? As littles sisters? Enfim. Passei um bom tempo sem sequer ter a oportunidade de jogar Bioshock Infinite, mas aqui e ali eu sempre via notícias do jogo, e alguns pedaços de gameplays do começo do mesmo, e vi que a trilogia estava numa promoção imperdível nessa Summer Sale de 2016 e decidi dar uma chance a Columbia. 

E eu quebrei a cara.

Eu não fazia ideia do quanto esse jogo era fantástico, muito menos que sua história era tão bem elaborada e complexa (eu realmente cheguei a repetir o final duas vezes e fiquei re-passando a história mentalmente pra ter certeza de que entendi tudo). Bioshock Infinite supera os dois primeiros em quase todos os aspectos (exceto o fato de você carregar um maldito Drill no segundo jogo xD ). Columbia é lindíssima, e rica em detalhes. Os gráficos são muito lindos, a trilha sonora é fantástica e cai como uma luva em cada momento. As personalidades do Booker e da Elizabeth são muito bem criadas e cativantes, além da dublagem dos mesmos que também são fantásticas. O jogo em geral é bem divertido e felizmente não estica a história demais, nem apressa demais. Cada momento de revelação de atinge de verdade. Por ser uma mudança radical dos dois primeiros, talvez se você for um fã do Bio 1 e do Bio 2, não goste do Infinite, mas o oposto também acontece. Talvez você não tenha gostado dos dois primeiros, mas goste do Infinite. De qualquer forma, é um jogo mais que excelente e altamente recomendo.

Одна из тех игр, которые можно порекомендовать кому угодно и не прогадать - идеально почти всё.

Что внутри:

+ Интересный и проработанный сюжет (почти без логических косяков)
+ Продуманный мир со множеством деталей и секретов, по которому хочется побродить и поисследовать
+ Каждый персонаж – не просто картонная моделька, а личность, которая к тому же, немного меняется по ходу игры
+ Отличная система ведения боя и разнообразие оружия
+ Концовка заставит некоторое время просидеть в ахуе, обдумывая, что же сейчас произошло.

Игра однозначно стоит своих денег.

FPS tür olarak mükemmel bir oyun deneyimi sunuyor.Mekanikler çok güzel işlenmiş ama asıl değinmek istediğim oyunun hikayesi.Hikaye kademeli olarak ilerliyor ve pek de anlam veremediğiniz noktalar oluşuyor.Bir süre sonra olaya hakim olduğunuzu düşünüyorsunuz ancak sonrasında tam anlamıyla heyecan, şaşkınlık ve hayranlık.Bu oyunu açıklamak gerekirse tam bir başyapıt.Bu oyunu sadece fps tür için oynarsanız çok şey kaybedersiniz.Kesinlikle hikayeyi anlayarak oynamaya çalışın.Bu oyun için bitmeyen değerlendirmeler yapılabilir.O yüzden son sözüm kesinlikle alın ve oynayın.Pişman olmayacaksınız..

Tek kelimeyle görsel bir şölen. Şehir mükemmel işlenmiş. karakterler çok iyi. Bazı yerlerde gerilip, soğuk terler dökerken bazı yerlerde ise kendinizi suratınızda büyük bir gülümseme ile Elizabeth'i izlerken bulabiliyorsunuz. Hikayesi ise ayrı bir konu, çok ince işlenmiş ve beklenmedik olaylarla dolu. Elizabeth'e gelecek olursak oynadığım oyunlardaki en iyi kadın karakterlerden birisi. 

Dünyası ise George Orwell'in ve Aldous Huxley'in distopyalarına benziyor. Mutluluk merkezi, tüm insanların huzurlu bir yaşam sürdüğü gibi gözüken dünyanın derinliklerine indiğinizde her şeyin ne kadar yozlaşmış ve göründüğünden farklı olduğunu kavrıyorsunuz. Bu da derin bir gerilim katıyor oyuna.

Sonuç olarak; Serinin önceki oyunlarını oynamamış olsanız bile alın, oynayın. Kesinlikle pişman olmayacaksınız.

I don't usually write reviews on games but this one makes an exception.

This game is truely a masterpiece. I was put off from this game since it was a bioshock title and I wasn't really fond of bs1&2 however this game was on sale and a friend of mine said it was his all-time favourite game and to give it a try.

I am so glad I did. I wish I could have gone and bought this at release when at full price because it was absolutely worth it. The story and the uniqueness of Elizabeth is like no other game I have played and I have never felt so involved with the characters of a game - the relationship between dewitt and liz is like a sponge.. you get absorbed into the development of them both.

If you're a fan of a rich story full of easter eggs and hidden meanings then this is a game for you. 

Even the DLC, in my opinion, compliments the game however they are very short and leave you wanting more.

To end this review I will say that I wish I could experience this game all over again for the first time. It is definitely one of my favourites. The gameplay is great, the soundtrack is amazing and once you have finished you will probably be left either scratching your head or completely blown away. I spend days (and still do) looking up videos on things that I may have missed and just to listen to the music again.

Buy it and enjoy it.

Infinite is the first Bioshock I've ever played, and it blew my mind. The story is not connected to the other two games and although the combat is not that different from the others, the suspense of the story will make your forget about all else. 
Also, prepare to embrace the ending explanations as soon as you finish the game and explain to everyone why you want your  daughter to be named Elizabeth. 
Overall, the game is a solid 10 if you are into the sci-fi combat and like atmosphere-type games.
Wow...
Es simplemente increible
damn

Una perla. Semplicemente, una piccola perla. Ho preso questo gioco solo perché in sconto, ma deo dire che avrebbe meritato il prezzo pieno. Intrigante, entusiasmate, a tratti frustrante (ma frustrazione positiva, quella che ti spinge a riprovare).  Muoversi a Columbia è uno spettacolo per gli occhi, anche più che muoversi a Rapture e riesce a dare un senso di ingabbiamento, proprio come nei capitoli precedenti, anche se sopsesa nell'aria. Ottimo comparto tecnico e doppiaggio.

Riesce ad incanalare diverse emozioni: tensione, paura, preoccupazione, amore. Tutto in un unico rapporto tra soli due personaggi, Brooker DeWitt ed Elisabeth.

Quest'ultima merita un paragrafo a parte: è un personaggio particolare, ben caratterizzato e di cui mi sono praticamente innamorato. Essenzialmente è il giusto compagno di avventura e, nel finale, l'affetto che proverete per lei diventerà totale e incondizionato.

Voto 10/10

Amazing story.

Mit weiten Abstand eins der besten Games aller Zeiten !!!

Ich wollte mich nur ein wenig vom lernen drücken und hab mich so gut wie verliebt (ich hoffe meine Freundin weiß nichts davon !). Das Game raubt einem tatsächlich den Atem. Und daus aus vielen Gründen. 

Pro:
-Die geilste Story aller Zeiten !!!
-Extrem gute Charaktere
-Extrem komplex, weshalb man es unbedingt verstehen WILL und sich ran hält ans Ende zu kommen (und dann trauert man, weil das Ende eingetreten ist.
-Ich als gestander Mann fühle sonst nie mit. Bei Games als auch bei Filmen. Tja, ich wurde geknackt ... 

-Extrem gut ausgearbeitete Welt (Lückenlos)
-Steampunk (ja ok, Steampunk passt eher ins Viktorianische-England ... wie nennt man das sosnst) wissenschaftlich und plausibel dargestellt. Lückenlos. Scheint, dass sich das Team Hilfe von einigen Wissenschaftlern geholt hat.
-Spielmechanik ist sehr gut und perfekt ausgebaut, Es ist nahezu unmöglich alà CoD durch Horden von Gegner zu metzeln ... Man muss denken und auch mal zusehen nicht den großen Krieger zu spielen.

-Tolle Animationen
-Spitzen Graphic (selbst jetzt, 3 Jahre, nach dem Release noch !!!)
-Gut ausgearbeitete Videos, die man nicht skippen will, da spannend, interessant, oder sogar sehr relevant !
-Sehr geiles Designe ! Von den einzelnen Soldaten, über die normalen Bewohner Columbias bis hin zu den Charakteren. Ich muss zugeben, Elizabeth kam rüber wie ein wasch echter Mensch (Großes Lob an die Synchro). Vorallem bei der Strand-Szene. Bei vielen Animationen dachte ich immer, dass es soooo real aussieht (Bewegungsabläufe und und und ...). Und das gilt eigentlich auch für die anderen Charaktere.
-Extrem gute, packende, realistische und spannende Dialoge.
----------------------------------------------------------------

Contras:
-Ich hatte nur einmal das Gefühl, dass es zu sehr in Richtung Ego-Shooter alà CoD geht (wo sag ich jetzt nciht, da Spoiler). Aber das war nur diese eine Szene und war auch dann schon wieder schnell verflogen, da darauf hin die Storyline wieder so packend war.

----------------------------------------------------------------

Im Großen und Ganzen:
Ich glaube, das war das beste Spiel, welches ich je gespielt habe !

不能你们说这个游戏好玩，我就觉得他好玩，这样未免给人一种钦（硬）定的感觉。但是真的玩通关之后，就一个感觉，吼啊！你问我资磁不资磁，我是资磁的。哥伦比亚的风景美如画，还有，没错我就是鬼父啊，好想和伊丽莎白不可描述啊！！！（题外话：买了前两部的9月送重制版，吼啊！）剧情方面刚开始玩没怎么看懂，但是总结起来就是两个字：阴谋，这都是阴谋啊！画面嘛，也是很棒的，让我从游戏开始到通关都想不停的按下F12。总而言之，强烈推荐！
awesome game

By far one of the greatest games I have ever played. I was expecting to go into this game thinking it would be a crummy/average game, but my expectations raised through the roof almost a quarter into the game. You don't even have to play the other Bioshock games to be caught up with the story, it's a whole new plot. This game can definitely be considered an emotional roller coaster that most people should get on immediately. I usually don't get affected by games from an emotional perspective, but this game definitely got me to feel something I usually don't feel with most games. The player can truly relate to the characters and the story in general which makes it much more enjoyable. I am currently in the middle of playing this game for the second time and will probably end up playing it a third. If you're worried that you cannot run the game, take it from someone who has a below average computer. If you change up some of the video settings in the option menu and run it in windowed mode, you should be able to run it fine. I had nearly 60 FPS and I can't even get 30 on Minecraft. I HIGHLY recommend this game to everyone.

I restrained from using Vigors as believed in my aiming and shooting skills in FPS genre.
I apologize to Elizabeth for reviving me countless times because of my stupid stubbornness. Ouch.

One of the few games that actually made me to play ALL of the DLCs aside from the main game. It also encouraged me to buy the two remaining games(Bioshock 1& Bioshock 2) of Bioshock series.

Story itself looks nothing special, a guy rescuing and protecting a girl from a villain for an opportunity to pay his debt.
Until you face the dark, mind-boggling truth. Just PLAY the game and find it out for yourself. 
Though I had to google 'understanding Bioshock Infinite's ending'. Yeah, I'm not a smart guy. LOL


It would have been great if the main game had a same UI as DLCs. Constantly looking for foes just for a sole purpose of swapping weapons was a bit stressful.

Bioshock Infinite - Не побоюсь этого слова "Игра Шедевр". Прекрасная, просто завораживающая графика, головокружительные полеты на монорельсах, зрелищные перестрелки с использованием всяких фичей(от соли, до разрывов кто в теме) и впервые в истории своеобразный напарник-помощник. У девушки(Элизабет) присутствует оригинальный ИИ, который будет помогать протогонисту в бою и вне его, от нахождения патронов, здоровья и соли, до поиска денег. Игра действительно заслуживает потраченных денег и я с уверенностью могу посоветовать ее вам. Геймплей, звуковая составляющая, графика, озвучка, все сделано на высшем уровне и я с гордостью поставлю игре все 10/10!

P.S. Полный руссификатор и русская озвучка существует и может быть скачана с сайта Playground.ru. Это придает игре еще больше атмосферности.

剧情画面流程战斗什么的不再赘述~
最关键的，有伊丽莎白妹子平时和你说话聊天，在你战斗时给你抛血瓶，抛弹药~死了能把你拉起来~
没事还卖萌跳舞给你看，其他的还重要么，重要么，重要么！！！
Great game!
My brain hurts
One of my favorite games. Has some performance issues on Linux, but nothing too bad. Well worth the money for both the base game and the season pass content.

Thoroughly have been enjoying this gorgeous game. Narratively, visually and aesthetically it’s 10/10s across the board. The relationship between Booker and Elizabeth is also a key point to highlight as it rivals even the multiplicity in character layers of Ellie and Joel from The Last of Us. This game is a clear winner and a must play!
